quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Winner and Cycle
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, model, chance. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The winner of Cycle 2 of Americas Next Top Model overcame a weight problem to shine in Tyra Banks music video and walk away with the top prize.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yoanna House

questions.question: Why couldnt Sonny focus on her test in the Sonny With a Chance episode Cheater Girls?

options.text: She was thinking of a sketch.
She was thinking of ways to trick Tawni.
She was thinking of her boyfriend.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was thinking of a sketch.

questions.question: In cycle 4 of Americas Next Top Model there was a flesh-eating virus scare and a friends suicide, but the winner had to overcome the judges belief that she needed to show her personality.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Naima Mora

questions.question: Americas Next Top Model Cycle 9s winner is one of the most controversial winners, due to her connections with Tyra Banks, the national Wendys ad campaign, and the fans general dislike of her.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Saleisha Stowers

questions.question: This girl won cycle 5 of Americas Next Top Model despite the famous Red Bull incident with the 2nd runner up.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nicole Linkletter

questions.question: Americas Next Top Models cycle 6s winner had a gap in her teeth and was rushed to the emergency room, but still came out on top.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Danielle Evans

questions.question: Who was the winner of the first season of Americas Next Top Model?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Adrianne Curry

questions.question: What is the name of Zoras pet snake on Sonny With a Chance?
Americas Next Top Model cycle 11s winner was one of the few who never ended up in the bottom two, and one of many who changed her model name. Name her.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brittany Sullivan

questions.question: What does Tawni think she is on the TV show Sonny With a Chance?
The winner of cycle 8 of Americas Next Top Model became the first winner to try out, and be rejected from, the semi-finals of a previous cycle.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jaslene Gonzalez

questions.question: Americas Next Top Model cycle 7s winner overcame psoriasis and a set of twins to win the coveted CoverGirl contract.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: CariDee English

questions.question: The main characters of the fictional show-within-a-show So Random! are Nikko, Grady, Sonny, Tawni,and Zora.
In cycle 3, she became the first African-American winner of Americas Next Top Model.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eva Pigford

questions.question: Cycle 10s winner has the distinction of being the first plus-size winner of Americas Next Top Model.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Whitney Thompson

options.text: She gives her a fake tattoo.
